baggage.name: A passion
baggage.description: A passtime you sank endless hours into, not related to work or survival - just something beautiful that you share with a few close friends.

baggage.name: Littermate
baggage.description: You forgot who you are and where you come from. You left the pack. And so you have become prey.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The persistent sense of rejection, unworthiness. Fear of being alone forever. You find out why.

baggage.name: Escaped prey
baggage.description: You hunted them once and they got away. Well now it's their turn, and they've brought backup, bitch.

baggage.name: A parent
baggage.subtitle: or other relative
baggage.description: They've always had a soft spot for you. Instead of driving you away, they look forward to when you come back to the pack.

baggage.name: The Cycle of Revenge
baggage.description: Fuckin corpos didn't tell you the target was a Dynastic daughter. Now they're all coming for you.

baggage.name: Your stash
baggage.description: You didn't come away from the army empty handed. You have stashes across the city for just the right occasion.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: The waves of nihilism. The nightmares you never remember. You find out why.

baggage.name: Corpo scum
baggage.description: You have simple boundaries: no kids, no innocents. Some clients just don't know how to be told "no".

baggage.name: War buddy
baggage.description: You've crossed paths in battle dozens of times, each time in a different body. You made the introductions that got them into this business.

baggage.name: Your work
baggage.description: They released it unfinished and ... wait... you dedicated your life to this to help people. What has this become?

baggage.name: A naysayer
baggage.description: They always doubted your intellect and sought to discredit you. Your mutual animosity has only escalated over the years.

baggage.name: Your hurt
baggage.description: A painful inability to feel anything as strongly as you see others experience. An inescapable sense of betrayal. You find out why.

baggage.name: A collaborator
baggage.description: Your closest friend and partner in progress. You rarely spoke about personal matters, but you always understood each other.

baggage.name: A curiosity
baggage.description: You have an inquisitive mind. It's what you designed yourself to do. When you noticed an inconsistency in the company, you couldn't help but to unspool that thread.
